title: Treasury sanctions Iran , Venezuela over combat drones , weapons trade
description: The department said Iran's unmanned aerial vehicle trade threatens U.S. personnel in the Middle East, and its trade with Venezuela poses security concerns in the Western Hemisphere.

# Treasury sanctions Iran, Venezuela over combat drones, weapons trade

The department said Iran's unmanned aerial vehicle trade threatens U.S. personnel in the Middle East, and its trade with Venezuela poses security concerns in the Western Hemisphere.
